Name: The Juxtaposition
Instructions: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Tangy, complex and smoothed by foaming pineapple.
History: Adapted from a long drink created in 2003 by Michael Butt and Giles Looker of Soulshakers, England.
